numbered_ace_sentences: 1. Legacy applicants are more likely to be admitted to elite colleges.
2. Students who have parents with a higher socioeconomic status are more likely to be admitted to elite colleges.
3. I wonder which moderator variables exist.
4. I wonder which mediator variables exist.
5. Socioeconomic status is not revealed on an application.
6. A student can have parents with a higher socioeconomic status for 18 years.
7. I wonder how having parents with a higher socioeconomic status for 18 years impacts the quality of a student's application.
8. Mississippi residents often stay in Mississippi for college.
9. Therefore, few Mississippi students have parents who attended an elite college.
10. The socioeconomic status in Mississippi is relatively low.
11. I wonder if these facts make it unlikely that Mississippi students are admitted to elite colleges.
12. I wonder what makes a college elite.
13. I wonder why no elite colleges exist in the South.
14. I wonder what the return on investment is for attending an elite college.
15. The headline is: Cycles of Power and Privilege.
